name: Garden-Based Education
description: Programming forgoes the lecture-audience teaching model and is structured around exploration, experimentation, and knowledge-sharing. In all classes, youth are physically active outdoors, have their hands in the soil, are trying new food combinations using plants they grew, and sharing stories of their relationship to food and land.
